sentences.en: Again the pregnancy was very similar to my previous two.
sentences.cn: 同样，这次怀孕和我前两次的情形非常相似。

sentences.en: CBS's ratings again showed huge improvement over the previous year.
sentences.cn: 与前一年相比，哥伦比亚广播公司的收视率再次大幅提高。

sentences.en: Donaldson was a petty crook with a string of previous offences.
sentences.cn: 唐纳森有一系列小的犯罪前科，但没犯过大事。

sentences.en: Douglas was a 29-year-old journeyman fighter, erratic in his previous fights.
sentences.cn: 道格拉斯29岁，是个技术不错的拳击手，在以前的比赛中发挥不太稳定。

sentences.en: He had even locked away all the videos of his previous exploits.
sentences.cn: 他甚至将记录他以前伟绩的录像带通通锁起来了。

sentences.en: he seemed to have been in good health previous to the fatal injury.
sentences.cn: 受那场致命伤之前，他的身体状况似乎一直很好。

sentences.en: He then launched a scathing attack on previous leaders.
sentences.cn: 他接着严厉地斥责了几位前任领导者。

sentences.en: He was over a second faster than his previous best time.
sentences.cn: 他比自己以前的最好成绩快了1秒多。

sentences.en: I was trying to blank out previous situations from my mind.
sentences.cn: 我试图将先前的境遇从大脑中抹去。

sentences.en: It is certain that Rodney arrived the previous day.
sentences.cn: 罗德尼肯定是头天到的。

sentences.en: It is worth remembering that previous wills are nullified automatically upon marriage.
sentences.cn: 要记住的是，一旦结婚，原遗嘱自动失效。

sentences.en: Once the rate rises it never drops back to its previous level.
sentences.cn: 一旦价格上去了就再也不会降到以前的水平了。

sentences.en: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.cn: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

sentences.en: Stewart was foaming at the mouth about an incident the previous afternoon.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特正为头天下午的事件而大发脾气。

sentences.en: The bank foreclosed on the mortgage for his previous home.
sentences.cn: 银行取消了他先前住房的抵押赎回权。

sentences.en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
sentences.cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

sentences.en: Their new album features remixes of some of their previous hits.
sentences.cn: 新专辑主要收录了一些他们曾风靡一时的老歌的混音版本。

sentences.en: While previous jobs that use these stages will continue to run, you should use the new functionality because it has superior productivity and performance.
sentences.cn: 在使用这些阶段的以前作业将继续运行时，您应该使用新的功能，因为其具有优越的生产率和性能。

phrases.tran_cn: 上一页，前一页；返回上一级菜单
（国会议事程序中作为动议提出的）先决问题

trans.tran_cn: 先前的，以前的，过早的，（时间上）稍前的
trans.tran_en: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about
